title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
excerpt: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies that are soft and chewy
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)|In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugars until smooth|Beat in eggs and vanilla|In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt|Gradually blend into the creamed mixture|Stir in chocolate chips|Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased cookie sheets|Bake for 9 to 11 minutes or until golden brown|Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before removing to wire rack
notes: Store in an airtight container for up to 1 week
